actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 427 (a) (2) (A) of the Higher Education Act to provide that federally insured student loans may be made with endorsement, but shall not be required by eligible lenders to be made with endorsement.

summary.text: Provides, under the Higher Education Act, that federally insured student loans may be made with endorsement, but shall not be required by eligible lenders to be made with endorsement.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 427 (a) (2) (A) of the Higher Education Act to provide that federally insured student loans may be made with endorsement, but shall not be required by eligible lenders to be made with endorsement.
